fullText: Despite the considerable talents of its leading players, this ambitious musical about the tempestuous relationship between composer Kurt Weill and lyricist-performer Lotte Lenya never quite finds its emotional center.
dtliExcerpt: Despite the considerable talents of its leading players, this ambitious musical about the tempestuous relationship between composer Kurt Weill and lyricist-performer Lotte Lenya never quite finds its emotional center.
